content.text: Learn how to create a pill navigation menu with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create a pill navigation menu with CSS.

content.code: Home   News   Contact   About
content.code_html:
<div class="pill-nav">
  <a class="active" href="#home">Home</a>
  <a href="#news">News</a>
  <a href="#contact">Contact</a>
  <a href="#about">About</a>
</div>

/* Change the color of links on mouse-over */
/* Add a color to the active/current link */

syntax_highlighting.text: /* Style the links inside the pill navigation menu */
/* Change the color of links on mouse-over */
/* Add a color to the active/current link */

content.code_html:
/* Style the links inside the pill navigation menu */
.pill-nav a {
  display: inline-block;
  color: black;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 14px;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 17px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

/* Change the color of links on mouse-over */
.pill-nav a:hover {
  background-color: #ddd;
  color: black;
}

/* Add a color to the active/current link */
.pill-nav a.active {
  background-color: dodgerblue;
  color: white;
}

content.text: Add display: block to the links, and they will appear vertically instead of horizontally:
content.html: Add display: block to the links, and they will appear vertically instead of horizontally:
